blocks.name: atcvat3i
blocks.content: A condition implying that a certain lattice element is an atom. Part of Lemma 3.2.20 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcvat3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wa(wa(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c2))), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat)))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  imp4c(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat))
  exp4b(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat))
  syld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1))), wa(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat), wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wi(wa(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wa(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wa(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wa(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)))), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, c1)))
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, c1)))
  biimpa(wcel(c1, cat), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cat), wb(wn(wss(c1, c2)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, c1))), wcel(c2, cch))
  chcv1(c2, c1)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wb(wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  breq2d(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wceq(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  eqssd(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  sseqtrd(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  eqsstrd(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1)), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wceq(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(c2, chj, co(c1, chj, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)))
  oveq2d(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c1, chj, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)))
  chjcom(c0, c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wceq(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(c2, chj, co(c1, chj, c0))))
  mp3an1(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cch), wceq(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(c2, chj, co(c1, chj, c0))), wcel(c2, cch))
  chjass(c2, c1, c0)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wss(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wi(wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wss(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1)))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wss(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, c0), co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1))))
  chlej2(c0, co(c2, chj, c1), co(c2, chj, c1))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wceq(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c1, cch), wceq(co(co(c2, chj, c1), chj, co(c2, chj, c1)), co(c2, chj, c1)), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch))
  mpan(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c2, chj, c1), cch), wcel(c2, cch))
  chjcl(c2, c1)
  chjidm(co(c2, chj, c1))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wss(co(c2, chj, c1), co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  syl21anc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wss(co(c2, chj, c1), co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  chub2(c1, c0)
  mp3anl3(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)), wss(co(c2, chj, c1), co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(c2, cch))
  chlej2(c1, co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wb(wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c2, ccv, co(c2, chj, co(c0, chj, c1)))), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wa(wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch)), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  jctil(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  cvexch(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))
  expdimp(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wa(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cat)), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cch), wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cch), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wcel(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(c0, chj, c1), cch))
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  chincl(c2, co(c0, chj, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat))
  atcvat2(cin(c2, co(c0, chj, c1)), c0, c1)
}

thm atcvat3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)→(((¬ c0 = c1 ∧ ¬ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1))→(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  imp4c((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, ¬ c1 ⊆ c2, c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms)
  exp4b((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, ¬ c1 ⊆ c2, c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms)
  syld(((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧ ¬ c0 = c1), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms, (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, ((¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1))→(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c2[<oH](c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)))
  ex((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)), c2[<oH](c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)))
  mpbird(((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧(¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1))), c2[<oH](c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), c2[<oH](c2[vH]c1))
  ad2ant2lr(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c1 ⊆ c2, c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), c2[<oH](c2[vH]c1))
  biimpa(c1 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c1 ⊆ c2, c2[<oH](c2[vH]c1))
  mpan(c1 ∈ HAtoms, (¬ c1 ⊆ c2 ↔ c2[<oH](c2[vH]c1)), c2 ∈ CH)
  chcv1(c2, c1)
  adantrl((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c1 ⊆ c2, c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2[<oH](c2[vH](c0[vH]c1))↔ c2[<oH](c2[vH]c1)))
  breq2d(c2, ccv, (c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), (c2[vH]c1), ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms)∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)))
  sylan((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2[vH](c0[vH]c1))=(c2[vH]c1), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  anim12i(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  eqssd((c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), (c2[vH]c1), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)))
  sseqtrd((c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), (c2[vH]c1), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1)), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)))
  eqsstrd((c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1)), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0), ((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH)∧ c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2[vH](c0[vH]c1))=((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0))
  eqtr4d((c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0), (c2[vH](c1[vH]c0)), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  oveq2d(c2, chj, (c0[vH]c1), (c1[vH]c0), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH))
  chjcom(c0, c1)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0)=(c2[vH](c1[vH]c0)))
  mp3an1(c1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0)=(c2[vH](c1[vH]c0)), c2 ∈ CH)
  chjass(c2, c1, c0)
  imp((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0)⊆((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1)))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1)→((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0)⊆((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1))), c0 ∈ CH, (c2[vH]c1)∈ CH, (c2[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  simpl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  adantl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c2[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  ex((c0 ∈ CH ∧(c2[vH]c1)∈ CH ∧(c2[vH]c1)∈ CH), c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH]c0)⊆((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1)))
  chlej2(c0, (c2[vH]c1), (c2[vH]c1))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), ((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1))=(c2[vH]c1))
  syl(c1 ∈ CH, ((c2[vH]c1)[vH](c2[vH]c1))=(c2[vH]c1), (c2[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  mpan(c1 ∈ CH, (c2[vH]c1)∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH)
  chjcl(c2, c1)
  chjidm((c2[vH]c1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆(c2[vH]c1), (c2[vH]c1)⊆(c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)))
  syl21anc((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c2[vH]c1)⊆(c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), c1 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  simpr(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  chub2(c1, c0)
  mp3anl3(c1 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), (c2[vH]c1)⊆(c2[vH](c0[vH]c1)), c2 ∈ CH)
  chlej2(c1, (c0[vH]c1), c2)
  syl((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ((c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1)↔ c2[<oH](c2[vH](c0[vH]c1))), (c2 ∈ CH ∧(c0[vH]c1)∈ CH))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c2 ∈ CH ∧(c0[vH]c1)∈ CH), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  jctil((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c2 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  cvexch(c2, (c0[vH]c1))
  expdimp((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬ c0 = c1, (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ((¬ c0 = c1 ∧(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))[<oH](c0[vH]c1))→(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ HAtoms), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ CH, c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms, (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ CH, c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  atelch(c1)
  sylancr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1))∈ CH, c2 ∈ CH, (c0[vH]c1)∈ CH)
  chjcl(c0, c1)
  chincl(c2, (c0[vH]c1))
  simpl(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms)
  simpr(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ HAtoms)
  atcvat2((c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)), c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: atcvat4i
blocks.content: A condition implying existence of an atom with the properties shown. Lemma 3.2.20 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atcvat4i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wa(wne(c2, c0h), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ecase3d(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat)), wi(wa(wne(c2, c0h), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0)))))), wceq(c0, c1), wss(c1, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c2, c0h), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1))), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0))))))))
  imp4a(wcel(c1, cat), wceq(c0, c1), wne(c2, c0h), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0))))))
  com4l(wcel(c1, cat), wceq(c0, c1), wne(c2, c0h), wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0))))))
  a1i(wss(c0, co(c2, chj, c1)), wi(wcel(c1, cat), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wne(c2, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0)))))))))
  ex(wcel(c1, cat), wceq(c0, c1), wi(wne(c2, c0h), wrex(s0, cat, wa(wss(cv(s0), c2), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, cv(s0)))))))

  mpbii((c2 ⋂ c1)= 0H, (c1 ⋂(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))⊆ 0H, (c1 ⋂(c2 ⋂(c0[vH]c1)))⊆(c2 ⋂ c1))

blocks.name: atdmd
blocks.content: Two Hilbert lattice elements have the dual modular pair property if the first is an atom. Theorem 7.6(c) of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atdmd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
} = {
  pm2.61d(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch), wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cat)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c1, chj, c0)))
  cvp(c1, c0)
  breq2d(c1, ccv, co(c1, chj, c0), co(c0, chj, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cat)))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, cat), wceq(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c0, cch))
  chjcom(c1, c0)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch), wi(wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1)), wcel(c0, cch))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wbr(c1, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
  cvdmd(c0, c1)
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wn(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h)), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1), wss(c0, c1))
  con1bid(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h), wss(c0, c1))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch), wb(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0h)))
  atnssm0(c1, c0)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch), wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1)), wcel(c0, cch))
  atelch(c0)
  3expia(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cdmd, c1))
  ssdmd1(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atdmd(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→ c0[MH*]c1)
} = {
  pm2.61d((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH*]c1, (c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H, c0[MH*]c1, c1[<oH](c0[vH]c1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ CH, ((c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H ↔ c1[<oH](c0[vH]c1)))
  bitrd((c1 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms), (c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H, c1[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c1[<oH](c1[vH]c0))
  cvp(c1, c0)
  breq2d(c1, ccv, (c1[vH]c0), (c0[vH]c1), (c1 ∈ CH ∧ c0 ∈ HAtoms))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ HAtoms, (c1[vH]c0)=(c0[vH]c1), c0 ∈ CH)
  chjcom(c1, c0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ CH, (c1[<oH](c0[vH]c1)→ c0[MH*]c1), c0 ∈ CH)
  3expia(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c1[<oH](c0[vH]c1), c0[MH*]c1)
  cvdmd(c0, c1)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH), ¬(c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H, c0[MH*]c1, c0 ⊆ c1)
  con1bid((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH), (c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H, c0 ⊆ c1)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ CH, (¬ c0 ⊆ c1 ↔(c1 ⋂ c0)= 0H))
  atnssm0(c1, c0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ CH, (c0 ⊆ c1 → c0[MH*]c1), c0 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  3expia(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c0 ⊆ c1, c0[MH*]c1)
  ssdmd1(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: atmd
blocks.content: Two Hilbert lattice elements have the modular pair property if the first is an atom. Theorem 7.6(b) of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atmd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
} = {
  mpan9(wcel(c0, cat), wcel(c1, cch), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wral(hs0, cch, wbr(c0, cmd, cv(hs0))))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cat), wral(hs0, cch, wbr(c0, cmd, cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, cch, wbr(c0, cdmd, cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cch, wcel(c0, cat), wbr(c0, cdmd, cv(hs0)))
  atdmd(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cat), wb(wral(hs0, cch, wbr(c0, cmd, cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, cch, wbr(c0, cdmd, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cch))
  atelch(c0)
  mddmd2(hs0, c0)
  rspcv(hs0, c1, cch, wbr(c0, cmd, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cmd)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cat))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm atmd(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ c1 ∈ CH)→ c0[MH]c1)
} = {
  mpan9(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c1 ∈ CH, c0[MH]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH, c0[MH]hs0))
  mpbird(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ∀(hs0 ∈ CH, c0[MH]hs0), ∀(hs0 ∈ CH, c0[MH*]hs0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cch, c0 ∈ HAtoms, c0[MH*]hs0)
  atdmd(c0, hs0)
  syl(c0 ∈ HAtoms, (∀(hs0 ∈ CH, c0[MH]hs0)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ CH, c0[MH*]hs0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  atelch(c0)
  mddmd2(hs0, c0)
  rspcv(hs0, c1, cch, c0[MH]hs0, c0[MH]c1)
  breq2(hs0, c1, c0, cmd)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ HAtoms)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[MH]c1)
}

blocks.name: atmd2
blocks.content: Two Hilbert lattice elements have the dual modular pair property if the second is an atom. Part of Exercise 6 of [Kalmbach] p. 103. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atmd2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
} = {
  pm2.61d(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  cvp(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wi(wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1)), wcel(c1, cch))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1))
  cvexch(c0, c1)
  3expia(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  cvmd(c0, c1)
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wn(wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h)), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wss(c1, c0))
  con1bid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0h), wss(c1, c0))
  atnssm0(c0, c1)
  3expia(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wss(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cat), wss(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cmd, c1), wcel(c1, cch))
  atelch(c1)
  3com12(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wss(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cmd, c1))
  ssmd2(c1, c0)
}

  cvexch(c0, c1)
  3expia(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (c0 ⋂ c1)[<oH]c1, c0[MH]c1)
  cvmd(c0, c1)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), ¬(c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H, c0[MH]c1, c1 ⊆ c0)
  con1bid((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ HAtoms), (c0 ⋂ c1)= 0H, c1 ⊆ c0)
  atnssm0(c0, c1)

blocks.name: atabsi
blocks.content: Absorption of an incomparable atom. Similar to Exercise 7.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 34. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm atabsi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cat), wi(wn(wss(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c1, chj, c0), c2), cin(c1, c2))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)

thm atabsi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ HAtoms →(¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)→((c1[vH]c0)⋂ c2)=(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  ex(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂ c2)=(c1 ⋂ c2))
  syl5eq(((c1[vH]c0)⋂ c2), (c1 ⋂ c2), (((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))⋂ c2), (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  eqtr2i(((c1[vH]c0)⋂ c2), (((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))⋂ c2), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c2)))
  inass((c1[vH]c0), (c1[vH]c2), c2)
  ineq2i((c1[vH]c0), ((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c2), c2)
  3eqtri(((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c2), c2, ((c2[vH]c1)⋂ c2), (c2 ⋂(c2[vH]c1)))
  ineq1i((c1[vH]c2), c2, (c2[vH]c1))
  chjcomi(c1, c2)
  incom((c2[vH]c1), c2)
  chabs2i(c2, c1)
  ineq1d(((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2)), c2, c1, (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  eqtrd(((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2)), c1, (c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))), (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))))
  mpi(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))), c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c2))
  chub1i(c1, c2)
  sylc(c0 ∈ HAtoms, (c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)→((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2)))), c0 ∈ CH, c0[MH](c1[vH]c2))
  atelch(c0)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ HAtoms, c0[MH](c1[vH]c2), (c1[vH]c2)∈ CH)
  atmd(c0, (c1[vH]c2))
  mp3an23(c0 ∈ CH, (c0[MH](c1[vH]c2)→(c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)→((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))))), (c1[vH]c2)∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)
  exp32((c0 ∈ CH ∧(c1[vH]c2)∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH), c0[MH](c1[vH]c2), c1 ⊆(c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))))
  mdi(c0, (c1[vH]c2), c1)
  syl6eq((c1[vH](c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2))), c1, (c1[vH]0H), (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, chj, (c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2)), c0h, (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  syl5eq((c0 ⋂(c1[vH]c2)), c0h, ((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c0), (c0 ∈ HAtoms ∧ ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)))
  incom(c0, (c1[vH]c2))
  biimpa(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c0)= 0H)
  mpan(c0 ∈ HAtoms, (¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)↔((c1[vH]c2)⋂ c0)= 0H), (c1[vH]c2)∈ CH)
  chjcli(c1, c2)
  atnssm0((c1[vH]c2), c0)
  chj0i(c1)
}

thm atabs2i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cat), wi(wn(wss(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c1, chj, c2)), c1)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  3imtr3g(wcel(c0, cat), wn(wss(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(cin(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c1, chj, c2)), c1), wn(wss(c0, co(c1, chj, co(c1, chj, c2)))), wceq(cin(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(c1, co(c1, chj, c2))))
  atabsi(c0, c1, co(c1, chj, c2))
  chjcli(c1, c2)
  notbii(wss(c0, co(c1, chj, co(c1, chj, c2))), wss(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  sseq2i(c0, co(c1, chj, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(c1, chj, c2))
  eqtr3i(co(c1, chj, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(c1, chj, c2), co(co(c1, chj, c1), chj, c2))
  chjassi(c1, c1, c2)
  oveq1i(co(c1, chj, c1), chj, c2, c1)
  chjidmi(c1)
  eqeq2i(cin(co(c1, chj, c0), co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(c1, co(c1, chj, c2)), c1)
  chabs2i(c1, c2)
}

thm atabs2i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ HAtoms →(¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2)→((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))= c1))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
} = {
  3imtr3g(c0 ∈ HAtoms, ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))= c1, ¬ c0 ⊆(c1[vH](c1[vH]c2)), ((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2))=(c1 ⋂(c1[vH]c2)))
  atabsi(c0, c1, (c1[vH]c2))
  chjcli(c1, c2)
  notbii(c0 ⊆(c1[vH](c1[vH]c2)), c0 ⊆(c1[vH]c2))
  sseq2i(c0, (c1[vH](c1[vH]c2)), (c1[vH]c2))
  eqtr3i((c1[vH](c1[vH]c2)), (c1[vH]c2), ((c1[vH]c1)[vH]c2))
  chjassi(c1, c1, c2)
  oveq1i((c1[vH]c1), chj, c2, c1)
  chjidmi(c1)
  eqeq2i(((c1[vH]c0)⋂(c1[vH]c2)), (c1 ⋂(c1[vH]c2)), c1)
  chabs2i(c1, c2)
}
